statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_research WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, gene_expression FROM pharmaceutical_research WHERE gene_expression > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_research WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT sample_id, compounds_used FROM pharmaceutical_research ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(gene_expression) AS avg_gene_expression FROM pharmaceutical_research;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_research
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_date, gene_expression FROM pharmaceutical_research ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT sample_id, researcher_name, compounds_used FROM pharmaceutical_research WHERE gene_expression > 0.5
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_name FROM pharmaceutical_research
SELECT sample_id, compounds_used, experiment_date FROM pharmaceutical_research WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_id = 3;
SELECT dashboard_name FROM dashboards WHERE dashboard_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_type FROM dashboards WHERE dashboard_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_name ASC
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_content LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_type FROM dashboards WHERE dashboard_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY dashboard_type ASC, dashboard_name DESC
SELECT dashboard_name, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM dashboards JOIN reports ON dashboards.dashboard_id = reports.report_id GROUP BY dashboard_name HAVING num_reports > 3 ORDER BY num_reports DESC
SELECT * FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_owner FROM Dashboards WHERE dashboard_type = 'Sales'
SELECT report_content FROM Reports WHERE report_name LIKE '%quarterly%'
SELECT aggregation_type, aggregation_method, aggregation_date FROM AggregatedData WHERE aggregation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_owner FROM Dashboards WHERE dashboard_type = 'Sales' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT report_content FROM Reports WHERE report_name LIKE '%Quarterly%';
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_type, dashboard_owner FROM Dashboards ORDER BY dashboard_name ASC;

SELECT report_name, report_content FROM Reports JOIN AggregatedData ON Reports.report_id = AggregatedData.report_id WHERE AggregatedData.aggregation_type = 'Monthly' ORDER BY AggregatedData.aggregation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_name, report_type FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM dashboards WHERE dashboard_type = 'analytics';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM research_projects WHERE project_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_type FROM reports JOIN dashboards ON reports.report_id = dashboards.dashboard_id WHERE dashboard_name = 'Sales Dashboard';
SELECT * FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'API' AND source_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM research_projects WHERE project_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY project_start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_type FROM dashboards WHERE DATE(dashboard_date) = DATE('2022-06-30');
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, dosage, manufacturer FROM Drugs ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT r.researcher_name, p.patient_name, d.drug_name, r.report_id FROM ResearchData r JOIN Patients p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN Drugs d ON r.drug_id = d.drug_id;
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM Users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT drug_name, dosage, manufacturer FROM Drugs ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_type, report_date FROM Reports JOIN ResearchData ON Reports.report_id = ResearchData.report_id WHERE ResearchData.researcher_name = 'John Doe';
